|> Binary Data:
| 
| ID?        ?         ?        Fan   Mode
| /‾‾\      /‾‾\      /‾‾\      /‾‾\  /‾\
| 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
|      \__/      \__/      \__/      |
|       ?         ?        Temp    Enabled
| 
| Temp: 0b = 16°C .. 14b = 30°C
| Fan:  0b = Auto, 1b = Low, 2b = Medium, 3b = High
| Mode: 0b = Auto, 1b = Cool, 2b = Dry, 3b = Fan, 4b = Heat


|> IR Details:
| 
| Protocol=PULSE_DISTANCE
| Address=0x0
| Command=0x0
| Raw-Data=0x2
| 35 bits LSB first
| 
| HeaderMarkMicros=8850
| HeaderSpaceMicros=4500
| MarkMicros=650
| OneSpaceMicros=1650
| ZeroSpaceMicros=550
| NumberOfBits=35



----- TESTING -----



|> ON
| 
| 16° - 0x50000009 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1001
| 17° - 0x50000109 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 1001
| 18° - 0x50000209 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010 0000 1001
| 19° - 0x50000309 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0000 1001
| ...
| 30° - 0x50000E09 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 1110 0000 1001


|> OFF
| 
| 16° - 0x50000009 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001
| 17° - 0x50000109 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 0001
| 18° - 0x50000209 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010 0000 0001
| 19° - 0x50000309 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0000 0001


|> FAN SPEED
| 
| AUTO   - 19° - 0x50000309 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0000 1001
| LOW    - 19° - 0x50000319 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0001 1001
| MEDIUM - 19° - 0x50000329 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0010 1001
| HIGH   - 19° - 0x50000339 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0011 1001


|> MODE
| 
| AUTO - x   - 0x50000908 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 1001 0000 1000
| COOL - 19° - 0x50000309 - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0000 1001
| DRY  - 25° - 0x5000091A - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 1001 0001 1010
| FAN  - 25° - 0x5000090B - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 1001 0000 1011
| HEAT - 28° - 0x50000C0C - 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100 0000 1100
